headline: EOG Resources Appoints John D. Chandler to Board of Directors
summary: EOG Resources, Inc. (EOG) today announced the appointment of John D. Chandler to its Board of Directors, effective December 10, 2025. Chandler served as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of The Williams Companies, Inc. (Williams), a publicly traded energy infrastructure provider focused on the gathering, processing, transportation and storage of natural gas, from 2017 until his retirement in 2022. Chandler also serves as a director of Matrix Services Company and LSB Industries, I
